original_text: To Merari belonged the clan of the Mahlites and the clan of the Mushites: these are the clans of Merari.
korean_text: 므라리에게서는 말리 종족과 무시 종족이 났으니 이들은 곧 므라리 종족들이라

sentences.original_text: To Merari belonged the clan of the Mahlites
and the clan of the Mushites:
these are the clans of Merari.
